872190.name: Fantasy Grounds - Paths to Adventure: Elven Empires (Map Pack)
872190.description:
Paths
to Adventure: Elven Empires Map Pack

This collection of maps custom is built for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop and includes 20 incredible maps related to Elven Empires for use in your campaign. Both GM and Player maps are included.
The Elven Empires map pack is one of an eight-part collection by
Paths to Adventure cartography, usable in any game system.
You will find the following maps in this pack:
  • MAP 022: Enchanted Hedge Maze
  • MAP 034: The Grand Court
  • MAP 041: Autumnholm
  • MAP 049: Priory of Illumina
  • MAP 071: Elven Hyaline Domes
  • MAP 082: Royal Burial Mound
  • MAP 098: Pilgrimage to the Great Banyan
  • MAP 104: Passage to the Feyrealm
  • MAP 132: The Inner Sanctum
  • MAP 135: Hideaway of the Swan Maiden
  • MAP 145: Citadel of Lost Knowledge
  • MAP 157: Court of the Fey King
  • MAP 175: Escape from the Feyrealm
  • MAP 179: Harlequins Court
  • MAP 187: Dawnflower Search for the Sun Shards
  • MAP 191: Ancient Elven Tomb
  • MAP 200: Search for the Stone of Sunlight
  • MAP 209: Grand High Temple of the Gods
  • MAP 217: Forest Trail Environment
  • MAP 230: Sanctuary of the Divine Butterfly
Cartography by:
Justin Andrew Mason
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Trevor Armstrong, and Justin Mason
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
